description: Brewed from the fermented sap of the agave plant, pulque is a fierce spirit that’s been made in Mexico for millennia. Look for the unnamed bottle of milky white liquid at any small eatery in Oaxaca and pour yourself a shot. Their Pulque Gonzo shirt is an organic cotton-viscose blend and ode to this sacred plant.
name: Roark Pulque Gonzo SS Woven - Mens
